strength_details: Modern tech stack (Spark, Python, Azure Data Factory)
Clear role definition with focused responsibilities
concern_details: ASAP start date suggests some time pressure
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 4+ years of experience
Engineers with strong Azure cloud skills
Candidates experienced in building data pipelines
probe_details: Ask about typical work hours and on-call expectations
Understand the current state of the codebase and any existing tech debt
leverage_details: Experience with specific industries or data domains relevant to IBM's clients
summary.overall_assessment: This is a solid opportunity for a mid-level data engineer seeking a well-defined role within a large, established tech company. The modern tech stack and clear reporting structure are positive signs. The main trade-offs are the potential for some time pressure and the lack of visa sponsorship.
